Interrupts.Name: Decoy
Interrupts.Effects: Gain evasion against that attack, then after it resolves teleport 3 spaces to a free space, which is its 'real' location.

Actions.Name: Ambush
Actions.Effects: If made from stealth, The scout can dash 4 before the attack, becomes a critical hit (+[D]), and blinds on hit.

Actions.Name: Powder Pistol
Effects: A foe in range 2 takes [fray] damage.
May also be used as an effect whenever when the Scout critical hits, dashes, or teleports.

Actions.Name: Flash Bomb
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes are slowed. Slowed foes become burning and take [fray] damage.
